subject: 女神与男主角在山巅对决，剑光如虹
detail: 2D Chinese anime style, a goddess and the male protagonist face off atop a mist-shrouded mountain peak, their swords drawn and clashing—first the goddess’s blade flares with blinding light, then the male lead’s long sword ignites in response, finally illuminating a shattered starry cosmos swirling behind them; dynamic sword sparks fly outward, wind whips their hair and robes, lightning cracks across the fractured heavens, subtle tremors ripple through the cliff edge; background features a cosmic battlefield with floating celestial shards and glowing ancient runes; camera orbits smoothly around the duo in a full 360-degree cinematic loop, emphasizing scale, tension, and symmetry; Background sound: sharp metallic sword ring blended with deep thunder rumbles. Voiceover says in Chinese "命运的对决，爱恨交织。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山巅，两人对峙，剑光交织，背景是破碎的星河，高清晰度，8K画质
